items.title: PLCE Stock Tumbles 32% After Earnings Slump — Here’s How Trump’s Tariffs Hurt Its Bottom Line
items.description: Children's Place reported an adjusted net loss of $0.18 per diluted share compared with a street expectation of $0.70 earnings per share.

items.title: Binance Puts Out $5 Million Bounty To Track Down Token Listing Scammers Amid Surge In ‘Fake Agents’
items.description: Binance said it will reward verified tips that expose fake listing agents and impersonators.

items.title: Vitalik Buterin Pushes Back On Bernie Sanders’ Call To Pause AI Data Centres – Says Slowing AI Now Misses The Real Risk
items.description: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin stated on X that imposing limits on large-scale setups could be detrimental to smaller, decentralized AI data cent...

items.title: AG, PAAS, HYMC Stocks Gain Premarket As Spot Silver Extends Record Rally Past $66
items.description: First Majestic Silver Corp gained over 3% in premarket, tracking the precious metal, which surged to over $66 an ounce for the first time.

items.title: Opendoor Bull Eric Jackson Picks A Rather Dull Time To Launch His Crypto-Treasury Firm: Here's How His Other Bets Have Fared
items.description: The Canadian hedge fund manager, known for his early bet on Carvana, has emerged as a key stock picker.
